prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What are Stefan's true and genuine thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards me?

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood reviews the provided horary chart and catalogs the pertinent data as follows:

1. Planetary Positions and House Placements
 • Pluto at 2° Aquarius – assigned to the 1st House (House 1 begins at 3° Capricorn and contains Pluto)
 • Sun at 29° Aquarius – located in the 2nd House (House 2, beginning at 9° Aquarius, contains Sun, Mercury, and Saturn)
 • Mercury at 7° Pisces – placed in the 2nd House alongside Sun and Saturn
 • Saturn at 19° Pisces – residing in the 2nd House
 • Venus at 8° Aries – assigned to the 3rd House (House 3, beginning at 25° Pisces, contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron)
 • Neptune at 28° Pisces – also in the 3rd House and in its rulership
 • North Node at 28° Pisces (retrograde) – in the 3rd House
 • Chiron at 20° Aries – included in the 3rd House
 • Uranus at 23° Taurus – positioned in the 5th House (House 5, beginning at 20° Taurus, contains Uranus)
 • Jupiter at 11° Gemini – located in the 6th House (House 6 begins at 9° Gemini and contains Jupiter)
 • Mars at 17° Cancer (retrograde) – situated in the 7th House (House 7, starting at 3° Cancer, contains Mars)
 • Moon at 4° Scorpio – found in the 10th House (House 10, starting at 28° Libra, contains the Moon)

2. Major Aspects (orbs as noted)
 • MC Opposition IC           (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node    (orb: 0°)
 • Moon Sextile Ascendant       (orb: 1°)
 • Sun Sextile IC            (orb: 1°)
 • Sun Trine MC            (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Square Pluto         (orb: 2°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn         (orb: 2°)
 • Venus Sextile Jupiter       (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Square Chiron         (orb: 3°)
 • Moon Trine Mercury        (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node     (orb: 4°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus       (orb: 4°)
 • Mercury Sextile Ascendant    (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Sextile Ascendant       (orb: 4°)
 • Pluto Square IC          (orb: 4°)
 • Pluto Square MC          (orb: 4°)
 • Mercury Square Jupiter      (orb: 4°)
 • Ascendant Sextile MC       (orb: 5°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune      (orb: 5°)
 • Neptune Square Ascendant     (orb: 5°)
 • Venus Square Ascendant      (orb: 5°)
 • Ascendant Trine IC        (orb: 5°)
 • Sun Trine Moon          (orb: 5°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus       (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto       (orb: 6°)
 • Sun Square Uranus        (orb: 6°)
 • Moon Opposition IC        (orb: 6°)
 • Moon Conjunction MC       (orb: 6°)
 • Chiron Opposition MC      (orb: 8°)
 • Chiron Conjunction IC      (orb: 8°)

3. Geometric Patterns and Special Features
 • T-Square formed by:
  – MC at 28° Libra, Pluto at 2° Aquarius, and IC at 28° Aries, with the Moon at 4° Scorpio as the interjecting dynamic
 • Cradle configuration involving:
  – Moon at 4° Scorpio, IC at 28° Aries, Sun at 29° Aquarius, Ascendant at 3° Capricorn, and MC at 28° Libra
 • The Moon is noted as a waning gibbous
 • The overall chart exhibits a Bucket shape
 • A strong dominance of the Cardinal mode among inner planets, most of which reside in the bottom hemisphere
 • Mars is described as descending
 • Critical placements include the Moon on the Midheaven, while Chiron and the IC anchor the Nadir
 • A total of 11 Sextile aspects are present; the Sun is involved in 10 aspects

This assembled set of horary data forms the foundation for subsequent interpretations regarding the underlying dynamics of Stefan’s true thoughts, feelings, and intentions.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood examines the chart with clinical precision. She observes that Stefan’s significator is represented by Mars in the 7th House, placed in Cancer and currently retrograde. This placement suggests that his drive in matters of connection is imbued with both sensitivity and caution—a hesitation born from either past wounds or an internal tug between instinct and security. The square to Chiron confirms a vulnerability tied to potential emotional injury; Stefan’s desire to act is tempered by fear of inflicting, or suffering, pain.

The Moon, positioned in Scorpio in the 10th House, indicates that his inner world is marked by intense, perhaps even secretive, emotions. This placement hints that beneath a measured exterior lies a reservoir of passion. The Moon’s aspects—a sextile to the Ascendant and trine to Mercury—serve to smooth his internal processing of these emotions, yet the opposition to the IC unsettles his personal foundations, suggesting inner conflict between his private nature and public responsibilities.

Mercury in Pisces in the 2nd House coupled with Saturn in Pisces reinforces a gravity in his thoughts. His communication regarding this matter is likely to be indirect—cloaked in nuance or held back by a fear of exposure. The conjunction of Neptune with the North Node and Mercury’s square to Jupiter add layers of idealism and possible miscommunication. Stefan may be caught between a desire for passionate expression and a tendency to retreat into diffused, elusive thought patterns, making his intentions less straightforward than he might wish.

Supporting this, Venus in Aries in the 3rd House signals sudden, impulsive attractions, indicating there is a spark of raw, immediate interest. Yet, this fiery energy is balanced by the structure offered by Mars’ trine to Saturn, which implies that despite impulsive internal attractions, his method of approach is calculated and deliberate. The strong presence of sextile aspects—eleven in total—suggests opportunities and latent harmonies that have yet to be acted upon.

Finally, the geometric configurations—the T-square involving the MC, Pluto, and the IC, and the Cradle formation—emphasize an inner tension between his public image and private motivations, along with a nurturing element that seeks resolution in personal transformation. In summary, Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings are deeply conflicted: he is passionately attracted yet internally guarded, keenly aware of the risk of emotional hurt, and inclined to process his feelings with caution. His intentions appear to lean toward engagement, but are moderated by an overlaid sense of responsibility and self-preservation.
